user.title: Octopus Energy
user.description: Setup your basic account information. This can be found at https://octopus.energy/dashboard/developer/.

target_rate.title: Octopus Energy
target_rate.description: Setup a target rate period. Continuous target will find the cheapest continuous period for your target hours. While intermittent will find the cheapest periods with potential gaps, which when combined will meet your target hours.

data.Type: The type of target you're after
data.Start time: The minimum time to start the device
data.End time: The maximum time to stop the device

error.invalid_target_hours: Target hours must be in half hour increments.
error.invalid_target_name: Name must only include lower case alpha characters and underscore (e.g. my_target)
error.invalid_target_time: Must be in the format HH:MM

abort.not_supported: Configuration for target rates is not supported at the moment.

user.title: Update Account Info
user.description: Update your basic account information. This can be found at https://octopus.energy/dashboard/developer/.

abort.not_supported: Configuration for target rates is not supported at the moment.
